languages.text: {n}Приладив броню на изорванную в мясо руку, Соломон сквозь зубы произносит:{/n} "Если на этом все, мне нужно в медотсек. После вас, разумеется".
{n}After affixing the armour back over his shredded arm, Solomorne mutters through gritted teeth,{/n} "If that is all, I must visit the medbay now. After you, of course."
languages.original_text: {n}Приладив броню на изорванную в мясо руку, Соломон сквозь зубы произносит:{/n} "Если на этом все, мне нужно в медотсек. После вас, разумеется".

{n}After affixing the armour back over his shredded arm, Solomorne mutters through gritted teeth,{/n} "If that is all, I must visit the medbay now. After you, of course."

languages.text: {n}ずたずたになった腕に再び装甲を取り付けながら、ソロモーンは歯を食いしばりつつつぶやいた。{/n}「これでよろしければ、私は医務室に向かいます。もちろん、お先にどうぞ」
languages.original_text: {n}After affixing the armour back over his shredded arm, Solomorne mutters through gritted teeth,{/n} "If that is all, I must visit the medbay now. After you, of course."

traits.locale_text: {n}ずたずたになった腕に再び装甲を取り付けながら、ソロモーンは歯を食いしばりつつつぶやいた。{/n}「これでよろしければ、私は医務室に向かいます。もちろん、お先にどうぞ」

languages.text: {n}Nachdem er die Rüstung wieder um seinen verwundeten Arm gelegt hat, murmelt Solomorne mit zusammengebissenen Zähnen:{/n} "Wenn das alles wäre, müsste ich jetzt zur Krankenstation. Nach Euch, versteht sich."
languages.original_text: {n}After affixing the armour back over his shredded arm, Solomorne mutters through gritted teeth,{/n} "If that is all, I must visit the medbay now. After you, of course."

traits.locale_text: {n}Nachdem er die Rüstung wieder um seinen verwundeten Arm gelegt hat, murmelt Solomorne mit zusammengebissenen Zähnen:{/n} "Wenn das alles wäre, müsste ich jetzt zur Krankenstation. Nach Euch, versteht sich."

languages.text: {n}Après avoir renfilé son armure sur son bras en déchiqueté, Solomorne marmonne les dents serrées :{/n} « Si vous me le permettez, je dois à présent me rendre à l'infirmerie. Après vous, bien sûr. »
languages.original_text: {n}After affixing the armour back over his shredded arm, Solomorne mutters through gritted teeth,{/n} "If that is all, I must visit the medbay now. After you, of course."

traits.locale_text: {n}Après avoir renfilé son armure sur son bras en déchiqueté, Solomorne marmonne les dents serrées :{/n} « Si vous me le permettez, je dois à présent me rendre à l'infirmerie. Après vous, bien sûr. »

languages.text: {n}Tras volver a ceñirse la armadura sobre su brazo malherido, Solomorne masculla con los dientes apretados:{/n} «Si no se le ofrece nada más, me gustaría acudir a la enfermería. Después de usted, claro está».
languages.original_text: {n}After affixing the armour back over his shredded arm, Solomorne mutters through gritted teeth,{/n} "If that is all, I must visit the medbay now. After you, of course."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tras volver a ceñirse la armadura sobre su brazo malherido, Solomorne masculla con los dientes apretados:{/n} «Si no se le ofrece nada más, me gustaría acudir a la enfermería. Después de usted, claro está».

languages.text: {n}随后，索罗蒙将臂甲重新套在了受伤的前臂上，咬紧牙关，低声开了口。{/n}“如果没有其它事情，我得先去医务室了。当然，你先请。”
languages.original_text: {n}After affixing the armour back over his shredded arm, Solomorne mutters through gritted teeth,{/n} "If that is all, I must visit the medbay now. After you, of course."

traits.locale_text: {n}随后，索罗蒙将臂甲重新套在了受伤的前臂上，咬紧牙关，低声开了口。{/n}“如果没有其它事情，我得先去医务室了。当然，你先请。”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne, zırhını parçalanmış kolunun üzerine tekrar taktıktan sonra sıktığı dişlerinin arasından mırıldanıyor.{/n} "Benden istediğiniz başka bir şey yoksa revire gitmem gerekiyor. Tabii ki sizden sonra."
languages.original_text: {n}After affixing the armour back over his shredded arm, Solomorne mutters through gritted teeth,{/n} "If that is all, I must visit the medbay now. After you, of course."
